<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Idyllkin](/Feats.aspx?ID=2284) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Aasimar" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=256" />
<trait label="Lineage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=317" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 9 <sup>3.0</sup>

</column>

---

Your wild, unique features betray your [agathion](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=216) birthright. Serene celestials from the plane of [Nirvana](/Planes.aspx?ID=20), agathions seek the peaceful path, ensuring a better world for all to coexist. Your halcyon demeanor leads you to search for peaceful resolution to conflict. You gain the trained proficiency rank in [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10). If you would automatically become trained in Nature (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You know the [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10) language and gain the [Natural Medicine](/Feats.aspx?ID=815) skill feat.

<title level="2">Idyllkin leads to...</title>
[Agathion Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=2289), [Tranquil Sanctuary](/Feats.aspx?ID=2288)
